channel.title: Sebastian Staffa's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Sebastian Staffa's Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi everyone, I am Sebastian. I started writing my first programs in my early teens and have been at it since. Driven by the desire to write my very own video games I got into shader programming and rendering.

item.title: Imprint & Licences
item.description: Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG Sebastian Staffa Nachtigallenweg 5 48624 Schöppingen Kontakt E-Mail: imprint@sebastian-staffa.eu Telefon: +4925553210780 Haftung für Inhalte Als Diensteanbieter sind wir gemäß § 7 Abs.1 TMG für eigene Inhalte auf diesen Seiten nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen verantwortlich.

item.title: On How To Lead Devs
item.description: During the last two years, my role in my current company has shifted from being purely a developer. It is still mainly a technical role where I am tasked with designing and implementing software, and I have also been entrusted with a few (junior) developers whose code I review and for whom I write tickets.

item.title: Azure revisited
item.description: You see, I think of myself as someone who is able to admit when he has made a mistake. As such, I am not afraid to say that time has proven my initial, optimistic evaluation of Azure to be more than wrong.

item.title: Azure vs. AWS - First Impressions
item.description: If you have worked in a big company for your whole working life, you may not now what it is like to write software for a small business which mainly builds custom tailored solutions.

item.title: Building nvidia-docker containers with nix
item.description: How to convert the output of a derivation into a self contained package is one of the most important questions when developing productive Software with nix, even for prototype applications.

item.title: Business Card
item.description: Hi there! Thanks for scanning my business card!
